Dahyun Kang

Hi! I am a Ph.D. student at POSTECH under the supervision of professor Minsu Cho. My research lies in the areas of computer vision and deep learning, especially in the problems of learning with minimal supervisions and learning to discover image relations. My name is pronounced as DAH-yon

News

Jul 1, 2024 A paper on open-vocabulary segmentation is accepted to ECCV 2024.
Jun 3, 2022 I started my research internship at Meta @ Paris !
